Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design

Services for working with default page types backed by data from default connector types, with default page workflow.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAuthenticatedPage
    Common interface for all pages that must be accessed with an authenticated user ticket.
    IDashboardContext
    Provides access to page processing context for dashboard pages, including proxied access to relevant page processor methods.
    IDashboardDesign
    Defines the design for a default starting page for an authenticated user.
    IDashboardPage
    Provides data for a default starting page for an authenticated user.
    IDataDesign
    Base interface for designing pages bound to a master data source.
    IDataPage
    Base interface for pages bound to a master data source.
    IDesignService
    Provides access to pages bound to record sources provided by a connector, and manages page designs.
    IFormContext
    Provides access to page processing context for form pages, including proxied access to relevant page processor methods.
    IFormDesign
    Defines the design for a form page for an authenticated user, for viewing or editing a record.
    IFormPage
    Provides data for a form page for an authenticated user, for viewing, editing, or creating a record.
    IListContext
    Provides access to page processing context for list pages, including proxied access to relevant page processor methods.
    IListDesign
    Defines the design for a list page for an authenticated user, for navigating records.
    IListPage
    Provides data for a list page for an authenticated user, for navigating records.
    IPageAsset
    Provides a reference to other resources that may be attached to a page, such as stylesheets or scripts.
    IPageAssetGroup
    Defines a group of related page assets, such as a set of stylesheets or a set of files defining a scripting framework.
    IPageContext
    Provides access to page processing context for page implementations.
    IPageGuard
    Defines collections of paths that are guarded by authentication services.
    IPageGuardPredicate
    Defines exceptions to page guarding rules for specific resources.
    IPageProcessor
    Provides a filtering capability for standard template-based page flow for ViewShell applications.
    IPageProcessorContext
    Manages state information while processing a page requested by an authenticated user.
    IPageRouter
    Defines and validates routes that dynamically select a resource based on attributes of a HTTP call.
    IPageRouteResolver
    Provides custom URI resolution, overriding default rules for determining which page is mapped to a specific URL.
    IPageRouteSelector
    Provides custom page routes, overriding default route URI selection.
    IPageSelector
    Provides custom page selection rules, overriding default page selection rules.
    IPasswordAuthnDesign
    Provides an authentication form for a password-based authentication service.
    IPasswordAuthnPage
    Provides page design context for an authentication form for a password-based authentication service.
    IRouteContext
    Provides access to page routing parameters.
    IThemedDesign
    Base interface for pages that require templates for rendering and with which style sheets can be associated.
    IThemedPage
    Base interface for pages designed using a template and style sheets.

Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design Description

Services for working with default page types backed by data from default connector types, with default page workflow.
  • The IDesignService is a starting point for default page-based navigation, and for designing such pages.
  • The IThemedDesign interface is the base for designing pages. The IThemedPage interface is the base for creating instances of these pages with these designs.
  • The IPageAsset interface models additional assets (stylesheets, scripts, etc) that can be added to a themed page design.
  • The IPageProcessor interface provides extension points for customizing default data processing and rendering behavior.
  • Customizable page designs include:
    • Authentication pages (login forms).
    • Dashboard starting pages for authenticated users with valid tickets.
    • List pages for authenticated users with valid tickets authorized to view specific datasets provided by a connector.
    • Form pages for authenticated users with valid tickets authorized to view specific records provided by a connector.
  • The IPageSelector interface enables custom page selection rules, depending upon the authenticated user and upon the data to render.
Since:
1.0
